name: Jolly Roger Motocross
description:
Game Objective: Jolly Roger is a pirate from hell and he's about to cross some really dangerous obstacles on his cool bike. Ghosts can't feel pain or get hurt, so all the crazy stunts are allowed as long as you don't break the bike! Use your skills to control the awesome biker and have fun reaching the dead end.

Controls: Use Up / Down arrow keys to Move and Left / Right arrow keys to Rotate the motorcycle.
